entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
